1669670.name: SEQUENCE STORM - Olokun Dive! Expansion Pack
1669670.description:
This expansion pack contains 10 new tracks to play in the arcade.

3:00 (Nite Crew Edit) - 2DCAT
Biollante's Special Herbs - Kaiju Summer
Bloom - SEQUENCE STORM Originals
Extinction - Sunhiausa
End of Human Era - Sunhiausa
Orbit - SEQUENCE STORM Originals
Planar Surfaces - Young Jaguar
Tropical Storm - Sunhiausa
What Would You Do? - 2DCAT
Woc It Up A Notch (With Remulak) - kalabi

And 17 soundtrack items:

2DCAT - 03:00 (Nite Crew Edit)
2DCAT - 03:00 (Nite Crew Edit) - Short Edit
Kaiju Summer - Biollante's Special Herbs
Kaiju Summer - Biollante's Special Herbs - Short Edit
SEQUENCE STORM Originals - Bloom
Sunhiausa - End of Human Era
Sunhiausa - End of Human Era - Short Edit
Sunhiausa - Extinction
SEQUENCE STORM Originals - Orbit
YOUNG JAGUAR - Planar Surfaces
YOUNG JAGUAR - Planar Surfaces - Short Edit
Sunhiausa - Tropical Storm
Sunhiausa - Tropical Storm - Short Edit
2DCAT - What Would You Do?
2DCAT - What Would You Do? - Short Edit
kalabi - Woc It Up A Notch (with Remulak)
kalabi - Woc It Up A Notch (with Remulak) - Short Edit
